column5: Jen's Hide-out is one of three rooms available in The Bolero House. This is a private queen bedroom with a private entrance and bath. A double room is available as an add-on with this room. Just ask! The house is in a quiet residential neighborhood on a cul-de-sac. Included are a small fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, and basic continental breakfast.  SPECIAL EVENTS = TWO NIGHT MINIMUM  Like us on !
